name: 7.7 "How to Win Friends and.." Online Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Woody called the party line in the beginning of the episode, who did he talk to?
questions.explanation:
Cliff Clavin.

	It's often been joked about the fact that Cliff didn't have a lot of friends. The fact that he called the party line helped to prove this theory.

Rebecca.

	Rebecca was getting her picture taken because a newspaper was doing an article on women who ran pubs. She was not happy about it at all because she said she always tensed up when someone was taking her picture.

appendicitis.

	The way Cliff talked about it, they thought that it was something major. When they found out, they told him there was nothing to it.

questions.text: Who got driving lessons from Sam?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Lilith and Frasier decided to take a trip through the country and Lilith thought that she should help drive. Sam didn't realize what he was getting himself into when he agreed to take her driving.

questions.text: What did Rebecca say the bar was big enough for?
questions.correct: people who like "The Munsters" and "The Addams Family"
options: people who like "The Brady Bunch" and 'The Partridge Family"
people who drink martinis and beer
people who eat beer pretzels and beer nuts
questions.explanation:
people who like "The Munsters" and "The Addams Family".

	The men in the bar were arguing over which show was better "The Munsters" or "The Addams Family". It got to the point where one person was going to leave because he didn't want to be around the people who liked "The Munsters". Norm said, "I take back what I said about Cousin Itt."

questions.text: Who originally went to see Cliff before Frasier went?
questions.explanation:
No one.

	Everyone had an excuse for why they didn't go. Frasier got nominated to represent the bar and go visit Cliff.

questions.text: Who sat on the man at the hospital?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff realized how obnoxious he was and that was why he didn't have friends. He talked about having to do something drastic and Frasier told him he didn't need that. The man in the bed said, "Oh yes he does."

Sam.

	This was a result of teaching Lilith to drive. Lilith cut a man off and then when the guy started to yell, Lilith gave him the finger. She then got out of the car with Sam and the man punched Sam in the nose.

questions.text: What did Cliff use to improve the fact that he was so obnoxious?
options: a smack across the head each time
questions.explanation:
shock therapy.

	Frasier recommended regular therapy but Cliff didn't think that it was enough. Cliff decided the best way to improve his personality was shock therapy.

questions.text: What did Al say when he got a hold of the shock button?
questions.explanation:
"Dance, mailman".

	Cliff had set the shock button down and Al got a hold of it. Because of the shocks, it made Cliff move like he was dancing. Al apparently was entertained by this.
